description: This file defines Spring configuration classes related to auditing and request filtering in a Java Spring Boot application. It configures JPA auditing and registers a custom filter for authentication purposes for API endpoints.

classes.name: AuditConfig
classes.description: Spring configuration class for setting up JPA auditing and registration of a custom authentication filter.

methods.name: myAuditorProvider
methods.description: Provides an AuditorAware bean for JPA auditing, using an implementation named AuditorAwareConfig.

methods.name: authUserFilter
methods.description: Registers a custom filter AppAuthUserFilter to intercept requests matching /api/* pattern.
